author: arancibiapablo
title: Meetup Northeast Argentina 2022
description: There was never an event about Blockchain or Cardano in the Northeast region of Argentina.
solution: With the support of the Catalyst and the ECOM Chaco company we want to organize the first Meetup in the Northeast of Argentina.
experience: We are currently working together in a company developing on the Cardano blockchain and we are working on the creation of a local community.
